website_summaries.verdict: Single 12-inch subwoofer to choose when you want a little bit of acoustic improvement in your vehicle sound system.
pros: Great, value-friendly price tag will fit most beginner budgets
Uses a simple design Pioneer has relied on for decades to deliver better audio and a great amount of durability thrown into the mix
Creates a flat, neutral frequency distribution in the bass end
cons: May require extra assembly, cutting, drilling, and preparation in smaller vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Rated for 500 watts RMS/ 1500 watts max. I powered mine with a 450 watt @ 4 ohm X1 channel amp. Lasted only a few weeks, and even after it was properly warmed up I could smell the voice coil letting out some smoke at higher levels. This POS can only handle maybe a fraction of 500 watts, more like 100- 200 watts max RMS. Don't waste your hard earned money on this joke of a sub unless you like to smell the off-gassing of glowing voice coils.
customer_reviews.author: USA1

customer_reviews.title: Hits hard then catches fire
customer_reviews.text: Great sub. 500 watt rms is great. Hits hard Update: Sub did a catastrophic meltdown Literally caught fire
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Punches hard for the price
customer_reviews.text: Punches really hard. Bass is deep for the price make sure you have a decent amp and box!
customer_reviews.author: Denziiey

customer_reviews.title: NICE HEvy bass at a good price
customer_reviews.text: nice deep bass at a very decent price. I would definitely recommend it to all bass lovers. Great sound. Low distortion.
customer_reviews.author: FRED BLAISE

customer_reviews.title: Tight bass with thunderous power
customer_reviews.text: I used this sub to replace the driver in my powered subwoofer in my theater room and it delivers everything I need and want in a sub. Its perfect for music and movies. The bass from this sub is thunderous. I set the crossover at about 90 and it delivers all the low frequencies needed to shake the foundation of my house. Ive used car subs in the house for many years now and this pioneer is better than the JL audio I was using before. This sub is definitely worth more than 60 bucks. I highly recommend this to anyone in need of a perfect 12 inch sub.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: great for back massage and making people in traffic hate ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely would buy another one.This 12 inch pound's H.A.F..great for back massage and making people in traffic hate being around you.I will buy another one soon and would recommend this to my friends for sure.I'm pushing this 1400 Watts max power and 400 Watt's RMS power with a 1500 Watts max and 700 Watt's RMS power Planet Audio monoblock amp.I need to upgrade my app tho amp it gets a little hot at times.I got it wired down to 2 ohms now and damn...loving it..still breaking it in just got it 2 weeks ago..I will post a video soon..
customer_reviews.author: J.D

customer_reviews.title: Budget ballin. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. But. I have the paperwork. Voice coils are actually 2.9, not 4. There is no way these are rated at 1400w max. I blew one yesterday with not even 800w . Anyways, following amp suh matching guidelines, if you run your hard....these won't last. Ps coming from an oldschool pioneer fan..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners or on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 of these couple months ago n just bought a 2nd cuz for the price is a steal. I usually use more stream line subs but after getting the 1st broke in I knew I had to buy another cuz it thump pretty damn hard for pioneer. Definitely 2 thumbs up for these n I'm very critical when it comes to car audio.
customer_reviews.author: chris burress

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beast
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beast wired mono can’t wait to get a second one. Plus have a real slim profile
customer_reviews.author: aaron van matre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these subs since 2016 and they still hit hard they cant be beat for the price i accidentally punctured 1 of the 2 and its still sits there and pumps out the bass its a little weaker now with the probably 2in by 2in chunk missing out of it but doesnt quit trying i will absolutely buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It's a subwoofer.
customer_reviews.text: I put this subwoofer in a sealed box behind the driver seat of my el camino. I haven't owned a previous subwoofer so I don't know how this one compares, although I believe it performs very well. I can easily feel the bass, and it hits hard. I paired it with a Polk Audio PA D5000.5 900W.
customer_reviews.author: VenerableSage

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more!!
customer_reviews.text: This sub absolutely pounds! The construction is quality and so is the bass!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of most awesome subs ever. sound very clear and nice boom!! Best deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brackin

customer_reviews.title: Great budget speaker...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sub for the $$. Good clean bass. Wired it to 2 ohm. Pushing a 12" with a pioneer mono amp rms 500 watts. Perfect combo in my opinion. Very happy so far...
customer_reviews.author: IAM Marcus.9

customer_reviews.title: NICE LOW FOR THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this and have it hooked up in a sealed box and connected to a Sony XM-3001SXD and it sounds great for the price,Im thinking of getting a second.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sub
customer_reviews.text: Popped my old sub, needed a replacement, this works great !

customer_reviews.title: Nice box, garbage speaker
customer_reviews.text: Blew up within 15 minutes with minimal power to speaker. Nice looking box but puny magnet on speaker. This speaker is not what they are advertising it is. Also appears to have NO RETURNS as a policy. Basically overpaid for a nice box
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing subs. At first the quality was below average but then a week later when I got my new amp installed and finished breaking in the subs, these babies hit hard. The quality is great now, they blast as loud as I want them to go and even further. Sometimes to the point that I have a tough time hearing the song. With two of these It will be forever before I have to replace them, now all I need are some tweaters and mids so I can actually hear the song.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Great first sub
customer_reviews.text: Its good for the price and for beginners. Just 1 peaker paired with a 1200 watt amp and a good box is loud enough for my 2012 civic.
customer_reviews.author: Alex irwin

customer_reviews.title: Speaker not working properly
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of the speaker I like the brand but I had bad luck that the one I received doesn’t work I’m waiting for a response from the manufacture
customer_reviews.author: Jesus yes

customer_reviews.title: Give them time to break in
customer_reviews.text: Gave them a week at low volume until turning up. Pushing two 12's with a 1600w pioneer monoblock amp. Using a not so deep box, because i own a mustang and they still hit great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this sub
customer_reviews.text: By far the best 12 for 60$ highly recommend it. It have a very clean loud sound and can take lots of power.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, poor durability

customer_reviews.text: This is one great sub! I put this single sub in a cheap box that fits under the rear seat of my 2012 sierra crew cab with a cheap" Boss 1100 watt riot " monoblock amp. My sons were really put out by the fact that their " old" Dad's truck hits harder than their cars with 2 twelves! 😂😂 So, yes order this!! You, yes you!!! Order it you'll be impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Both speakers seemed to be blown and they won't talk to me for me to return

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sounds surprisingly good for the price, and i know my subs
customer_reviews.author: olena Strokach

customer_reviews.title: Works but not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure about this sub. I was kinda expecting more from this. Seemed to bottom out extremely easy when I was using it for the first week. Definitely needs a really long break in time. I almost couldn't hear it in my trunk for the first week. Had to put the back seat down to even get my mirror to move from the bass. After about a month i gave up and bought 2 jbl stage 1210 12s both push total 500 rms and the pioneer was 400 rms. Jbls are tearing my inside of my car up. Glad i got rid of the pioneer
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Killer Sub!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you can't beat it. This guy with an Alpine PDX - 600w mono-block is silly I tell you. SILLY. Sooooo. Yah. It just blew. Not sure how much this guy likes 33hz. Still sounded good.

customer_reviews.title: I'm more then happy with the this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly satisfying !!!!!! Bought a pair for a custom box and let me tell u, I'm more then happy with the this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: 12inch 1400watts pioneer on a 1600 mono block pioneer amp💪💪💪💪
customer_reviews.text: Best sub i ever had i must say i got 2-12inch both are 1400 watts on a 1600 mono block D 2 channel pioneer amp and the hit like a beast very hard i love it aeesome stuff very amaze😎😎

customer_reviews.title: Great sub
customer_reviews.text: Wow. What a great sub. The price is great. I have this paired with a Pioneer GM-D8601 amp wired at 2 ohms and it hits hard! I have it installed in a Belva 1.5CU sealed box and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan J.

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer Quality
customer_reviews.text: Another Five Star Pioneer product! Being able to purchase quality automotive stereo components in the most trusted brands from the comfort of home is wonderful. Item arrived ahead of schedule, was packaged securely, and as usual Amazon delivers the items to my front door at about half the price of local retailers! A wonderful upgrade from an aging stereo. These are very nice sounding speakers at this price point. These speakers coupled with some good mid range speakers will enhance your listening experience.
customer_reviews.author: paedomorph

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive with the bass line. Makes my corolla rumble.
customer_reviews.author: pedro

customer_reviews.title: Great sound awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound awesome price. Bought it for my son. Paired it with the pioneer gm-d8601 class d amp. Go great toget her. Clear sound & response. Waiting to see how it holds up & sounds after being broken in. Would recommend this to other ppl tho. Have it wired down to 2 ohms wish my sons wanted the 2nd sub just so I could hear it .hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the price fool you. Kicker is a leading competitor in the boom for your buck club.. and these are at 25% to make me happy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome expedient delivery.. Great boom for the buck. You can always bet on kicker to get you that perfect balance of craftsmanship and reliability. At rated rms.. two of these babies, it's amazing, the sound is amazing.. great punch for a larger diameter speaker, and great lows into the 40s steady.. I'm pleased and will be a Kicker or nada for life..

customer_reviews.text: I hooked this sub with a planet audio 4000watts it only lasted two weeks, and i wasnt even punching it hard, maybe i should of used a smaller amp.

customer_reviews.title: This subs are awesome. If you want an easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This subs are awesome. If you want an easy set up... here it goes. This sub with the mono D pioneer and a Q bomb box. And yes, only 1- 12" sub will shake your ride. This is my set up and I really like it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ray R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Powerful deep bass. Exactly what i was looking for in a bass speaker. Two thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: J. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME.. Running them in my 04 Toy Sienna
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME..Running them in my 04 Toy Sienna.. Yes!!!! Didnt wanna spend $$$ the money on high end subs.. I have too much power!! Built a nice custom box 5.25 cubes per internal space ported. Port area if I remember is 9"L x 4"W. Good old chrome Memphis ST1200D. 0G wire wire. HOLY SH**! Now... I'm not trying to smoke the woofers hanging in the high school parking lot.. I'm grown.. Just wanted some good thump in the old van. Running the old school great Soundstream Referance Amps on the Mids and Hi's and it sounds fantastic. Been installing for 30 years as a hobby... Remember..You can smoke any woofer if really try. GREAT SUBS.. for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bbox 12" ported is a near perfect fit for this Subwoofer if using a single one
customer_reviews.text: Bbox 12" ported is a near perfect fit for this Subwoofer if using a single one. Anything better would require a custom built box.
customer_reviews.author: Tevis G

customer_reviews.title: Only order box,not speaker
customer_reviews.text: Work for a couple of days then never work again.I was on the way to work and it work for 5 minutes then just turn off and never work again. My amp still work on a other speaker.so bought new speaker and reuse the box.😔😔😔
customer_reviews.author: John E Barrios

customer_reviews.title: Sound like high end Sub-woofer & yet inexpensive way to built
customer_reviews.text: Powerful & soothing bass. Well integrated with my Single 12" Vented Sub-woofer Box Speaker with Yung SD300-6 300W Class D Subwoofer Plate Amplifier Module with 6 dB at 30 Hz. Sound like high end Sub-woofer & yet inexpensive way to built.
customer_reviews.author: DNyam

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: I am running this subwoofer wired for two ohms on the pioneer GM-D8601. The box is a vented 1.5 cubic foot box. I have a 2 farad capacitor. The amp puts out 500 watts rms and the subwoofer handles it well. It is punchy and has very deep tones. It shakes up my Camaro. I would recommend this for anyone wanting a good subwoofer for a low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things just hammer!
customer_reviews.text: WOW, if you want some serious bass, these are the speakers. I powered 2 of these to 1 ohm and ran it with the GM-D8601 and good god! I LOVE THEM!!!!!!!!!!!! Thank you Pioneer, you guys ROCK!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Clair

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BASS FOR A LOW PRICE JUST TUNE YOUR AMP PROPERLY .. GREAT SUB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers. Bought them for their high sensitivity rating. They sound great mounted in a sealed box.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sub!
customer_reviews.text: Great Sub! Pounds Hard and Tight! Takes a beating and gives one, too. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.text: I have connected with different amps and doesn't sound as expected i guess is not as good as they used to make them

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these speakers
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these speakers. Fast delivery, easy instal and it is all ....about... .. that bass! Awesome and we thank you. Very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Great sub for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sub for the price! Got it hooked up to a hifonics HF 2000d amp and it can handle it!
customer_reviews.author: David loving

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Clean and loud in sealed box powered by Pioneer GM-D8601 Class D amp. Don't let the price fool you. These are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it still works better than my previous speaker in the same cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Powerful. I am pushing it with a 1400 watt amp (or so claimed). Dual voice coils means one coil moves the other coil which moves the cone - is what I figure. My cabinet is too small, but it still works better than my previous speaker in the same cabinet. I use as a sub, and with crossover, so only play low frequencies through it. This is in vehicle. Plenty of bass, and with the right size cabinet it will sound even better. $50 price range is a very good value. Still within the first week as of writing, but did a 1500 mile trip with bass booming, (I like accurate sound reproduction, not dumb stupid)
customer_reviews.author: buying guy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price but high-quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these hooked up to the Pioneer GM-D8601 amp and it sounds wonderful. If you are going for a dual 12" set up, I highly recommend getting these subs paired with the amp listed above. Pros: - Cheap price. - Great sound. - Powerful. - Aesthetically pleasing. Cons: - I have not found any.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Yanke

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: Always been a Pioneer fan, but these are great subs. Sound excellent with every genre of music. Make sure you check the dimensions before you buy a box or if you already have one. I power two of these with a Pioneer GM-D8601 Class D Mono Amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Buy one. Or two.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the sound quality that comes out of this speaker. With my Pioneer 1600Watt amp tuned propperly this sounds great even tapped into a stock system of a 2005 vehicle. Comes withh all installation material (screws ans foam ring) Keep in mind, the sub box is just as important as the amp used or sub itself depending on the sound you are looking for and taste of music. I personally bought this with a single ported box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy
customer_reviews.text: So.ordered this to replace an old sub in my car,sealed box,1.5 ft of air space on a 400 watt rms amp with the gain a 1/4 of the way up as it was in the "break in" period. Well.10 days later its smoked.im assuming its a defective model,but supposedly I cant return it so I'm not too pleased.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Amazing subs for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these speakers for my husband along with ASC ported speaker box and Pioneer 2600 watt mono block amp and this setup is the best I've heard and he has owned... Two thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shana M

customer_reviews.title: For the money the sound is great however, I didn't realized how big they were ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money the sound is great however, I didn't realized how big they were I should have went with 10". Totally satisfied with the performance & sound highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: These subs are out of this world! I have them each running on 400 watts rms and they shake my whole car so much I had to dynamat it all. Plus they are a great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Martinez

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: A very good sub for a really good price. The bass hit clean and hard and the speaker is built really well. It is an all around great sub, would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Chase

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad sub but be sure to use a amp under ...
customer_reviews.text: I give it three stars for the price. Not a bad sub but be sure to use a amp under 1400 peak power. I blew my sub in a short period
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Long

customer_reviews.title: Killer subs
customer_reviews.text: I put these, paired with the pioneer gmd8601 mono block amp, and built a 3cu ft ported box tuned to 33 hz for a customers truck..he broke them in slowly for the last couple of weeks and and came back in to give me a demo. Lets just say there will be some soundskin coming for this truck soon...ive installed a lot of subs in my day and im not sure you could beat these for the money..they are really clean and crisp and still get super low...i know once we go full power we're gonna see a little window flex!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker for the money and average music listener!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker can supplement your sound system or it can completely dominate it. As a first time sub owner I was blown away at how powerful just one of these can be. Note that i do not consider myself a bass head. Just a guy who wanted some thump to go with his synth pop/retro wave. Sounds great in a sealed box with the recommended pioneer amp!
customer_reviews.author: Nun-ya

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Had the sub installed today, I've have a alpine in my daily driver, and a kicker sub in my pleasure vehicle. I have this pioneer in my truck, and it is terrible, there's hard plastic on the front of the sub, and when you crank the volume the plastic makes this God awful popping noise, at medium volume it's barely noticeable, bass is distorted. I'll be replacing this real soon. Don't be cheap like I was spend the extra $40 And get a kicker or alpine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BLOWN
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two, both blown already. Ran them wired in series-parallel powered by a Rockford r500x1d which is WELL below the max power rating. I gave these two weeks to fully break in. I'm only a few days out of my 30 day warranty, so I can't return them.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Spend money and go better.
customer_reviews.text: Blew 2 up the first week. Spend money and go better.

customer_reviews.title: Decent but junk
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap sub for a little while, had it wired at 4ohm to break it in for a bit then resently wired it to 2 ohm, and it started cutting out, and now quit. Opened box to put it back to 4 ohm and it smelt blown. Amp was not turned up at all, not pleased at all with this sub. Amp was a 900 watt pioneer.

customer_reviews.title: ... i expected i wish i had kown that it suck this bad
customer_reviews.text: its not what i expected i wish i had kown that it suck this bad

product_meta.title: Alphasonik AS12DF 12" 1500 Watts 4-Ohm Down Fire Shallow Mount Flat Enclosed Sub woofer for Tight Spaces in Cars and Trucks, Slim Thin Loaded Subwoofer Air Tight Sealed Bass Enclosure
product_meta.description: Style:12" 1500 WattsBy installing the subwoofer downward, the AS down-firing enclosures optimize bass response with superior efficiency for richer, deeper, heart pounding low frequency sounds regardless of the enclosure installed position. The sleek design of the AS enclosures allows for installation anywhere in the vehicle, they can be installed vertically or horizontally. The durable MDF wood construction is designed to reduce vibration. Additionally, a special bonding sealer is used to create an air-tight seal to increase joint strength as well as bass reflex. The spun aluminum cone stays rigid even with the most powerful bass notes. Alphasonik's compact down-firing enclosures perform superbly, producing extreme bass with minimal space.
feature_bullets: Power Rating: 500 Watts RMS / 1500 Watts Max
Cone Material: Spun Aluminum Cone | Surround Material: High Strength Rubber EPDM Enhanced Surround
Final Impedance: 4-Ohm | Copper Wound Kapton Voice Coil | Push Type Terminals
Enclosure Dimensions: 20.47" x 6.7" x 14.1" / 520mm x 170mm x 358mm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars198 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
